headline.main: VON PAPEN ASSAILS ROOSEVELT SPEECH; Nazi Envoy Tells Germans in Turkey Talk Was 'Slap in Face of Historic Truths' URGES MORE PROPAGANDA Insists Reich Fights Only to Protect Borders and Give New Order to Europe

lead_paragraph: ISTANBUL, Turkey, Jan. 2 -- A bitter attack on President Roosevelt has been made by the German Ambassador to Turkey, Franz von Papen, in his latest speech to the German colony, although higher German official circles at home have so far maintained reserve concerning the President's address.
abstract: Amb von Papen pleads with Germane in Turkey to further Axis aims, s to Istanbul German colony

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
